name: War Domain
description: Clerics who excel in battle, inspiring others and smiting enemies with divine power.

3.Bonus Proficiencies: You gain proficiency with Heavy armor and Martial weapons.
3.War Priest: When you take the Attack action, you can make one weapon attack as a Bonus Action. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum 1). Regain all uses on Long Rest.

Domain Spells.description: You always have certain spells prepared.

6.Guided Strike: When you or a creature within 30 feet makes an attack roll, you can use Channel Divinity to grant +10 bonus to the roll (use before or after roll, but before knowing outcome).

17.Avatar of Battle: You gain Resistance to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage from nonmagical attacks.
